text:
I am studing communication at Rennes 2 since 1 year. So I'm going to explain in this writing expression why i have made this choice.
 Firstly  during a long time I was looking for differents ideas of studies. I thought about chemestry to make perfums but I did'nt not have any skills in this class, so I gave up. One day in my hight school, there were a meeting with a lot of students who were explaining the studies. I went with a group who was studing a BUT in commercial technique. The format of BUT interested me a lot because it was only 3 years, and there were the possibility to work in a compagny at the same time. I decided to do some reaserch about this kind of formations and i've found communication BUT. I  realised that to me, it was more interesting than commercials techniques. Because in fact i have a huge interest to medias. I wrote few articles in my hight school's journal, and i loved it. But mostly i'm crazy about the backstages of everythings. For instance when i watch the news in TF1, a french chanel, sometimes theyr shows the backstages and to me it looks sensationnal. I appreciate the idea that they manage some things that we have no idea. Also do reports is very attractive to me, do reaserch, speak to people...
But then time goes and I realised that a BUT is so intense it's a lot of work and there is too a lot of homework. I know myself and I 'm not a hard worker so I realised i wanted something chiller. Licence is in fact very cool, because we don't have that much class so I'm able to have a job next to this and i'm very satisfied of it.
Now if  i should give my opinion on this formation : it's fifty fifty. I like it because there is a lot of free time but it's not that concret, i do not find a meaning in what i'm doing right now. For instance I dont' know what I'm going to do after this. So maybe I gone find a formation in something more social, to really help people in their personnales lives. It's so vibriting for me.
 This webpage performs keylogging of input typed into a textbox. In other words, when focused on the textbox below, the page will record each time you hit a key or select text with your mouse. All of the data is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and is dowloadable as JSON file. More information about the motivation  of this project and the format of the produced data are available here.
